error_auth.title: Authentication Required
error_auth.content: You must be authenticated as an IPS administrator to initialize a unit.

fields.markdown: Initialize and assign this QR to a unit by providing the following information:
**Please take a photo of the unit's serial number tag** (make it as clear as possible)
**Please take a photo of the unit's motor identification tag** (make it as clear as possible)

MAIN.title: Unit QR Assigned
MAIN.body_md: The QR has been successfully registered to the unit. Attach the QR to the unit in a protected but visible place for tracking service history and recording updates.
